resources.string: Question 1: If we have a tree of n nodes, how many edges will it have?
Question 2: Which of the following data structures can handle updates and queries in log(n) time on an array?
Question 3: Of the following data structures, which has a Last in First Out ordering? In other words, the one that came in last will be the first to be popped.
Question 4: An RPC (remote procedure call) is initiated by the...
Question 5: What is the default value of a static integer variable of a class in Java?
Question 6: In Java, to prevent any method from overriding, we declare the method as...
Question 7: Which of the following variable declaration would NOT compile in a Java program?
Question 8: Re-implementing an inherited method in a subclass to perform a different task from the parent class is called what?
